long_description: Keep multiple pairs of boots or gloves dry, fresh and odor free with the DryGuy footwear and accessories dryer. Four tall heating tubes dry ski boots, hiking shoes, ski gloves, garden gloves or sweat caps in little time. Wide-body design accommodates two pairs of ski boots at the same time. Dryer heats to body temperature, so the drying process is safe for garments; you can also select to operate the unit without heat. Properly drying gear provides a healthy environment for feet and hands by fending off odor-causing fungus and bacteria that thrive in moist areas. Timer lets you select the drying duration, up to three hours. Most items dry within one to two hours, however, actual drying times vary by degree of garment dampness. Plugs into household outlets; UL listed.
short_description: Keep multiple pairs of boots or gloves dry, fresh and odor free with the DryGuy footwear and accessories dryer.
